Copy

public static void Copy( int[] dst, int p0, PInt32 src, int p1, int len );
Copies a PInt32 into a C# array.
Parameters:
dst - The destination C# array.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The allocated memory array to copy from.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (int32) elements to copy.

Copy

public static void Copy( PInt32 dst, int p0, int[] src, int p1, int len );
Copies a C# int32 array into a PInt32 class.
Parameters:
dst - The destination allocated memory.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The source int32 array.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (int32) elements to copy.

SizeOfType

public override int SizeOfType();
Returns sizeof(int32), 4 bytes as per MS specification, this is the 'atomic' element size.
